message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product to you, but I can only pay up to $9,500 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  How about $11,000?  It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to my target price.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I've decided to stick to my budget and would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can come to an agreement.
